channel.title: Hardware – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Blackcell 18650 Proton Battery – 2PK
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.content:encoded:
The Blackcell 18650 Proton Battery has a long storage life, is lightweight and has high energy density! This battery can also be used with high-drain devices that are compatible with 18650 batteries. The rechargeable battery is designed and performs with a powerful charge. Blackcell batteries are Li-CoMnNi and made with optimal rolled steel and materials. The Electron offers a dual functional pressure relieve valve making sure you stay safe. Blackcell go through a strict process and quality system while being tested by the TUV Rheinland.

Battery Details:

  • Brand: Blackcell
  • Model: Proton
  • Size: 18650
  • Nominal Capacity: 3018mAh
  • Nominal Voltage: 3.7V
  • Maximum Voltage: 4.2V
  • Discharge Current: 40.2A Maximum Pulse / 20.3A Maximum Continuous
  • Style: Flat Top

Package Contents:

  • 1x Blackcell 18650 Proton Battery – 2PK

Usage Specifications:

  • Fully charge before initial use
  • Always charge battery in/on a fireproof surface
  • Never leave charging batteries unattended.
  • To avoid short circuits, keep this battery away from metal objects (e.g. coins, keys, jewelry)
  • Keep the battery in its case or any other insulated material
  • To avoid shortening your battery’s life, do not overcharge it– doing so may result in the battery popping or leaking
  • Do not use the battery is there are signs of previous usage
  • Do not dispose battery with the use of fire
  • Stacking more than one battery at a time may result in explosion.
  • Never short the battery. Connect the positive and negative sizes.
  • Use special caution when working with Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable cells.

Warning-
1). Do not disassemble, dispose in fire, heat or short circuit
2). Do not insert batteries with the (+) and (-) reversed.
3). Do not mix fresh batteries with used batteries.
4). Do not submerge the battery in water.

item.title: Pivoi QI Fast Wireless Charger Pad
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Compatible Devices: iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, AirPods Pro and many more!
item.content:encoded:
Pivoi wireless charging pad is a Qi certified charging device that wirelessly charges your Qi enabled devices!

The slim Pivoi wireless charger pad provides ample surface area to charge your device efficiently. Use the Pivoi wireless charging pad to charge compatible devices including iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, and AirPods Pro and many more.

Specifications: DC Input 5V/2A and 9V/1.6A Output 10W

Design: High grade silicone body with ample surface space, portable and lightweight, suitable use for workplace, home and travel.

Features: Foreign Object Detection ( An LED light will flash rapidly letting you know if something metal is on the charger and needs to be removed.) , Overheat Protection and  Over Voltage Protection.

Package Content:

  • 1 x  Pivoi Wireless Charger Pad
  • 1 x  USB to Micro USB Cable
  • 1 x  Instruction Manual

item.title: USB to Type C Cable
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Very durable 3.3 ft long charging cable to charge your smartphone or device conveniently!
item.content:encoded:
VOI USB to Type C cables a 3.3 ft long charging cable to charge your smartphone or device conveniently. Get fast charging speed and seamless data transfer with this USB to Type C cable from VOI. Use the VOI USB to Type C cable with your Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 S8 S20 Plus, Note 10 9 8, LG V50 V40, Moto Z Z3, Other Type C smartphones and devices.

Design: Braided Red & Black color, 3.3 ft long charging cable goes through multiple quality tests for durability.

Features: Charges Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 S8 S20 Plus, Note 10 9 8, LG V50 V40, Moto Z Z3, and Other Type C smartphones and devices.

Package Content:

  • 1 x VOI USB to Type C Cable (Red) – 3.3ft

item.title: Nord 2 Pod
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Compatible with SMOK Nord 2 Kit, It comes in two variants: RPM Pod & Nord pod
item.content:encoded:
SMOK Nord 2 Empty Replacement Pod Cartridge is compatible with  SMOK Nord 2 Kit. It comes in two variants: RPM Pod & Nord pod. It comes with the E-Juice capacity of 4.5ml.

Product Highlight

  • RPM Pod
  • Nord Pod
  • 4.5ml E-Juice Capacity
  • Compatible Device  : Smok Nord 2 Kit

Package Content

  • 1x SMOK Nord 2 Empty Replacement Pod Cartridge (Coil not included)

item.title: VOOPOO Alpha 1 (α-I) MOD
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Super Retro design will make you feel like you stepped back in time!
item.content:encoded:
Description:
VOOPOO Alpha 1 (α-I) 222W TC Box Mod is powered by the super US Gene Fun chip and dual batteries. Accurately pulsed power output max 222w under LOVE mode. Cool, clean, all-metal box fast and fastest fire speed – 0.023s. You can always keep the mod up-to-date with upgradeable firmware too so you will never miss anything new. The attractive appearance is another feature that makes this mod simply irresistible. Powered by 2x 18650 High Amp batteries (sold separately) to easily be hidden inside of its retro design will make you feel like you are back in the 80’s or early 90’s!

Specifications:

  • Material: Zinc Alloy
  • Wattage: 5-222W
  • Size: 89.5*54*25mm
  • Battey: 2*18650(Support balance charging whatever brand batteries)
  • Output Voltage Range: 0-7.5V
  • Lowest Resistance in power mode: 0.05ohm
  • Lowest Resistance in TC mode: 0.05ohm
  • New function: Love Mode
  • TC Mode: SS,NI,TI,NC
  • Color Options: Black/ Gray / Pearl Chrome

Package Includes:
1 x VOOPOO Alpha One 222W Mod
1 x USB Cable
1 x User Manual
1 x Warranty card

item.title: VooPoo Drag Nano Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: WOW-GREAT PRICE! The Gene POD is the most advanced chipset for a pod system yet!
item.content:encoded:
VooPoo’s first pod system is a huge brake through… In a tiny package!

The Drag Nano Pod Kit is born, VooPoo’s tiny pod system is just 44g! the lightweight and portable pod kit is enjoyable anytime and anywhere! The Drag Nano’s intelligent cold boot mode is for an extreme flavor experience immediately on the first puff. The intelligent power output balance is fantastic for e-Liquid flavors as always. The Drag Nano’s 750mAh battery capacity can power about 350 puffs and can be charged in about an hour! Along for the ride is the new Gene.POD Chip adjusted more than 40 times with more than 200 flavor testers involved.

The Gene.POD is the most advanced chipset for a pod system yet!

Kit Features: 

  • Dimension: 54.5*35*11mm
  • Battery: On-Board 750mAh
  • Material: Zinc Alloy & Aluminum Alloy
  • Weight: 44G
  • Voltage Output: 3.2-4.2V
  • Charge Voltage: 5V/0.5A
  • Quiescent Current: <15uA
  • Pod Capacity: 1ml
  • Resistance: 1.8ohms
  • Material: PCTG
  • Size: 36.3*15*7.0mm

Package Contents:

  • 1x Drag Nano
  • 1x Nano Pod
  • 1x USB Cable
  • 1x Warranty Card
  • 1x GENE CHIP Card

item.title: TFV16 Lite Coil
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Shop SMOKs brand new coil system for the TFV16 LITE Tank!
item.content:encoded:
Shop SMOKs brand new coil system for the TFV16 Lite Tank! Conical Mesh and Dual Mesh designs better suit your vaping needs by projecting warm throat hits, massive unmatched flavor and high quality performance in each coil. The Lite coils offer a unique structure in each coil to better optimize e-Liquid flavors and performance all around. The airflow inlets condense vapor as it flows through the coil to the drip tip, creating an unparalleled burst of pure flavor! Each mesh coil consists of multiple structurally stable hexagonal designs that enables the mesh wire to heat evenly and spread properly saving you from burning your coils!

Coil Details:

  • Powerful & Warm Throat Hit
  • Fast Heating Rate
  • Massive Vapor & Amazing Flavor
  • 0.2ohm Conical Mesh Coil – rated for 60-85W
  • 0.15ohm Dual Mesh Coil – rated for 60-90W
  • Plug ‘n’ Play Coil Installation

Package Contents:

  • 1x SMOK TFV16 Lite Replacement Coil

item.title: JoyeTech Batpack Complete Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: The Batpack is the first vaporizer that is capable of using normal, disposable AA batteries as an option for a source of power!
item.content:encoded:
The Joyetech BatPack Starter Kit with batteries is completely authentic in power, brand and performance! The Joyetech BatPack comes equipped with the Joyetech Eco D16 Tank, two batteries and it delivers exclusivity in every sense of the word!

The distinctness behind the Batpack is that it is a very small vaporizer that literally fits in the palm of your hand…comfortably! (Imagine that?) This completely portable device makes vaping convenient and hassle-free every single time. The Batpack is recognized as the first vaporizer that is capable of using normal, disposable AA batteries as an option for a source of power. When you use fully charged rechargeable batteries (2000mAh), it gets you more puffs than the normal AA batteries while you’re vaping…(try 800 puffs)!

The Batpack also uses ECO technology to provide incredible vaping experiences while allowing the battery to have a very low output. The ECO technology doubles the battery life and extends the amount of time you vape before having to recharge the batteries. This is in part because of the Joyetech ECO D16 Tank which has a 2ml capacity and an anti-leak structure, so leaks become non-existent. Filling e-juice can be done directly and conveniently. Dripping a few drops of e-Lliquid to the atomizer head, avoids dry burns while you’re vaping. Not to be outdone, the ECO D16 works with the included BFHN 0.5ohm MTL coil head.

Kit Features:

  • Size:112.5 x 37.00 x 18.0mm (Including Tank)
  • Weight: 88.0g
  • Simple One Button Design
  • 1.85V Constant Output
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 2.0mL
  • Top Fill Design with Twist Off Cap
  • Dual Restrictive Airflow Hole Design
  • Lightweight and Compact Design
  • Optimized for Higher Nicotine Levels

Package Contents:

  • 1x Batpack Mod
  • 1x Joyetech ECO D16 Tank
  • 2x AA batteries
  • 2x BFHN 0.5ohm Head (MTL)
  • 1x Set of Spare Parts
  • 1x Micro USB Cable

item.title: SmokTech I-Priv KIT
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Comes with AI, in 3 different voices! It can clearly hear you, respond you and execute your commands!
item.content:encoded:
When a mod comes with AI, what will happen? The new product I-Priv will show you! It can clearly hear you, respond you and execute your commands. The mod shaped like a warrior, full of muscles, combining with 1-230W output power, it can guarantee powerful vaping effects. From its round TFT screen you can see a newly designed dynamic user interface. And the ergonomically designed lateral fire key is extremely convenient to operate. There’s also a LED light at the bottom, you can set to see flickering light. It’s equipped with TFV12 Prince tank, which has revolutionary strip coil and 8ml capacity. Besides, this mod is compatible with 21700, 20700 and 18650 battery. Advanced technology, multiple functions, your warrior is coming! Innovation keeps changing the vaping experience!

I-Priv MOD Specifications:

  • Size: 95.5 x 56 x 35mm
  • Weight: 188.6g
  • Power Range: 1-230W
  • Output Voltage: 0.5-8.2V
  • Resistance Range: 0.1-2.5 Ohm (VW) / 0.05-2 Ohm (TC)
  • Temperature Range: 200-600 F / 100-315 C

TFV12 Prince Tank Specifications:

  • Capacity: 8mL
  • Dimensions: 28 x 63mm
  • Weight: 60g
  • Material: Stainless Steel
  • Thread: 510

THE SYMBOL OF A WARRIOR – STRONG BODY – I-Priv mod has a strong body, which is fully covered with exoskeleton, giving the whole kit an unbreakable and charming look. Hold it on your hand, you can feel the super power from this warrior.

ARC REACTOR SCREEN – I-Priv has a round TFT screen at front, like the warrior arc reactor, providing inexhaustible power to the whole kit. Also, you can clearly see the vaping details through the screen.

YOU COMMAND YOUR WARRIOR RESPOND – I-Priv is designed with AI technology, it can accurately receive, respond, and execute your command. Below here are 14 command codes, the secret codes between you and your warrior.

*NOTE* One important thing, you must turn on the voice and choose the voice type first.

item.title: FamoVape Chill Pill Tank
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.content:encoded:
The FamoVape Chill Pill Tank is a masterpiece in it’s own as it features an adjustable liquid inflow. The swivel join under the atomizer controls how much liquid flows into the coil. This allows for complete control of your thick liquid. If you don’t need to vape at the moment, just lock the inflow valve, and the tank then becomes a safe reservoir void of any leaks.

The FamoVape Chill Pill Tank is actually quite relaxing….or chill. Either way it minimizes stress for any vaper wanting something easy to use!

Tank Features:

  • Tank Capacity: 1ml
  • Tank Resistance: 1.5Ohms
  • Coil-less Ceramic Atomizer
  • Adjustable Oil Inflow Valve

Package Contents:

  • 1x FamoVape Chill Pill Tank
